name: Cookie Clicker Remake
description: Click the cookie to earn cookies. You get the option to gain a golden cookie every 200 normal cookies you get, the golden cookie will appear for you to click which gives you another 200 normal cookies. There will be more updates to come like a store etc. Also, when you restart (by pressing the stop button) you will have to restart the whole game. I will implement a save system so you can keep your progress.
